author: deluckybrick
title: Basic and essential.
review: I got this set a few years, and I have found it good for building cars. No duh. Anyway, you can use it in the front, in the back, or on the side of a car, and they also fit well as windows on airplanes.  Goes well with 5132, the wheels and tires set.  I would recommend this or anything similar for anyone who builds Lego.
